title:
Existence of multisoliton solutions of the gravitational Hartree
  equation in three dimensions
abstract:
We consider the three-dimensional gravitational Hartree equation. We prove
the existence of multisoliton solutions with gravitational interaction of
hyperbolic, parabolic and hyperbolic-parabolic types, generalizing and
improving the result by Krieger, Martel and Rapha\"el which dealt with two
soliton solutions.
